sourcesContent:
<template>

<a-button>aaaa</a-button>

</template>


<script>
  import {httpAction} from '@/api/manage'
  import Vue from 'vue'
  import axios from 'axios'
  import {ACCESS_TOKEN} from "../../../store/mutation-types";
  import {JeecgListMixin} from '@/mixins/JeecgListMixin'


  export default {
    name: "vtn1",
    mixins: [JeecgListMixin],
    components: {},
    data() {
      return {
        isRadio: false,
        dataSource: [],
        columns: [
          {
            title: '用户姓名',
            align: "center",
            dataIndex: 'username'
          }, {
            title: '所在部门',
            align: "center",
            dataIndex: 'departs'
          }
        ]
        ,
        options: ["同意", "不同意"],
        comment: '',
        isNextTask: false,
        isCommentDo: false,
        isGongWen: false,
        isDownloadAll: false,
        isBack: false,
        nextTasks: [],
        nextUsers: [],
        confirmLoading: false,
        taskId: '',
        comId: 'nextTask',
        title: "操作",
        visible: false,
        url: {
          list:'111',
          nextFormUrl: window._CONFIG['domianURL'] + '/wf/task/nextForm',
          doTaskUsers: window._CONFIG['domianURL'] + '/sys/user/getMsgByRoleName',
          backUrl: window._CONFIG['domianURL'] + '/wf/task/backDone'
        },
      }
    },
    created() {
    },
    methods: {
      showTask(record) {

        this.selectedRowKeys = []

        let that = this

        this.taskId = record.id
        axios.get(this.url.nextFormUrl, {
          params: {
            taskId: this.taskId
          },
          headers: {
            'X-Access-Token': Vue.ls.get(ACCESS_TOKEN)
          }
        }).then(function (response) {
          if (response.data.success) {
            that.nextTasks = response.data.result
          } else {
            that.$message.error(response.data.message)
          }
        })
        this.visible = true
      },
      doTaskUsers(v) {

        this.selectedRowKeys = []

        if (v.isMultiInstance) {
          this.isRadio = false
        } else {
          this.isRadio = true
        }

        var roleName = ''
        if ((v.candidates).indexOf("'") >= 0) {
          roleName = (v.candidates).substring(1, (v.candidates).length - 1)
        }

        let that = this
        axios.get(this.url.doTaskUsers, {
          params: {
            roleName: roleName
          },
          headers: {
            'X-Access-Token': Vue.ls.get(ACCESS_TOKEN)
          }
        }).then(function (response) {
          if (response.data.success) {
            that.nextUsers = response.data.result
            that.dataSource = response.data.result
          } else {
            that.$message.error(response.data.message)
          }
        })

        this.showAndClose('isNextTask')
      },
      commentDo() {
        //去后台查 快捷意见


        this.showAndClose('isCommentDo')
      },
      gongWen() {
      },
      save() {
        this.close()
      },
      back() {
        //查询可退回节点

      },
      downloadAll() {
      },
      close() {
        this.$emit('close');
        this.visible = false;
      },
      handleCancel() {
        this.close()
      },
      showAndClose(name) {
        var list = ['isNextTask', 'isCommentDo', 'isGongWen', 'isDownloadAll', 'isBack']
        for (var i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
          var v = list[i]
          if (v == name) {
            this[name] = true
          } else {
            this[v] = false
          }
        }
      },
      optionSelect(option) {
        this.comment += option
        console.log(option)
      }, clearOptions() {
        this.comment = ''
      },
      fineshedByHand(){

      }
    }
  }
</script>

<style scoped>
  .ant-menu:not(.ant-menu-horizontal) .ant-menu-item-selected {
    /*background-color: white;*/
  }

</style>
